data.comment: The big names in today's match at Rentschler Field have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 1, Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in New York City.
New York City advance rapidly upfield but Nima Saghafi blows for offside.
In the minute 2, Toronto are whistled for offside.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Justin Morrow is booked for the home team.
In the minute 3, Play has been interrupted briefly in Hartford to check on Anton Tinnerholm, who is grimacing with pain.
New York City's Anton Tinnerholm looks ok and returns to the pitch.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for New York City at Rentschler Field.
In Hartford, Justin Morrow of Toronto is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 9, Important block from the New York City defence as Nick DeLeon fires in a strike for Toronto.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for New York City at Rentschler Field.
Nima Saghafi awards New York City a goal kick.
New York City are pushing forward but Keaton Parks's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 14, New York City's Ronald Matarrita misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 17, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
New York City are coming forward and Keaton Parks gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, Toronto have a goal kick.
Valentin Castellanos of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
In the minute 22, Toronto's Justin Morrow gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 23, Nima Saghafi signals a New York City throw-in in Toronto's half.
Valentin Castellanos for New York City drives towards goal at Rentschler Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 26, Maxi Moralez (New York City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toronto push upfield but Nima Saghafi quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for New York City in Hartford.
In Hartford New York City attack through Valentin Castellanos. The finish is off target, however.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 32, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Gary Mackay Steven of New York City is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of New York City.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for New York City at Rentschler Field.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Nima Saghafi signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Toronto's area.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 44, At Rentschler Field, New York City are penalized for being offside.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Nick DeLeon hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Hartford for Toronto.
Can Toronto capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Alexander Callens (New York City) gets a yellow card.
The second half has started at Rentschler Field.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 47, Gary Mackay Steven (New York City) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Nima Saghafi awards Toronto a goal kick.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 49, Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Toronto.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, New York City's Valentin Castellanos is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! New York City have got their heads in front thanks to a Jesus Medina strike.
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 53, Michael Bradley for Toronto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
New York City have a goal kick.
In Hartford, Valentin Castellanos (New York City) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 57, In Hartford, New York City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a first substitution, with Tsubasa Endoh replacing Patrick Mullins.
In the minute 59, The home team have replaced Justin Morrow with Jacob Shaffelburg. This is the second substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Nima Saghafi awards Toronto a goal kick.
Toronto are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
Nima Saghafi signals a Toronto throw-in in New York City's half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 67, New York City are pushing forward but Gary Mackay Steven's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 68, Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Toronto.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Toronto.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
The away team replace Gary Mackay Steven with Gudmundur Thorarinsson.
New York City's Jesus Medina breaks free at Rentschler Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of New York City.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Valentin Castellanos for New York City has been booked by Nima Saghafi and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for New York City at Rentschler Field.
Ralph Priso is replacing Liam Fraser for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 77, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City drives forward and Valentin Castellanos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 78, Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 81, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
New York City make their second substitution with Nicolas Acevedo replacing Keaton Parks.
Jayden Nelson is replacing Nick DeLeon for the home team.
In the minute 83, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 86, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
Ronny Deila is making the team's third substitution at Rentschler Field with Sebastien Ibeagha replacing Valentin Castellanos.
In the minute 89, Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Toronto.
Free kick New York City.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
New York Cityâ€™s Sean Johnson is on his feet again at Rentschler Field.
That's full-time at Rentschler Field. The final score is 0-1.
New York City's Jesus Medina has been booked in Hartford.
The match at Rentschler Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sean Johnson, who is down injured.
